comments:
Build 20020321

When I rename a java class using the default rename settings I get the 
following SWTException. Note that I did not have an editor open on the type I 
was renaming.

STEPS
1) Select a class
2) Select Rename
3) Internal Error

This problem could ocur when closing the editor right after renaming its input 
or when having dangling (i.e. disposed) editors around. Do you have more 
details on what you did? 

Introduced guards to prevent the stack trace.
